description: This file defines a Qwik component for a 'Next Steps' tutorial widget, guiding users through initial steps of using the Qwik framework, including instructions, event handling, and rendering UI elements.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main Qwik component that manages the tutorial steps and event handling.
Wraps functions to enable Qwik reactivity and serialization.

methods.name: useOnWindow
methods.description: Sets up an event listener for keydown events on the window to trigger step changes based on user input.

methods.name: useSignal
methods.description: Creates reactive state (gettingStartedStep) to track the current tutorial step.
